name: Secret Agent-Silent Assassin
description:
BECOME THE ULTIMATE STEALTH ASSASSIN
Follow the path of the silent assassin shooter. Rediscover stealth shooting, become a silent warrior assassin, wage a war against crime, criminals and gangsters alike. Immerse yourself in the most compelling target shooting game on mobile.

TACTICAL MISSIONS
For a master assassin shooter the most important trait is capitalizing on your stealth mode. Sneak through hotel security as a silent assassin agent and experience FPS and TPS in one title. Embody a hitman assassin and accept the task to find the best sniper shooter point and make your stand against evil. Take up your rifle and show the world your hitman sniper shooting skills. Act as an agent warrior hero; help jail break and rescue the innocent civilians locked inside by the drug cartel in this escape game. Experience a wide range of stealth agent missions e.g., hitman shooting, stealth missions, FPS shooter and rescue missions. Calculate your every move, hone your strategic skills and orchestrate the perfect assassination kill shot. Enjoy the best stealth game for mobile!

SURVIVOR CHALLENGE:
Survive the terrorist shootouts in the tight Vegas hotel security! Take up the hitman sniper assassin role and play the ultimate commando sniper game! Get out of there alive along with the hostages in this escape mission! Secret agent contract killer is a wonderful secret agent game with stealth assassin adventures with speed fights as a power hitman shooter. Experience fist to fist combat, silent kills, gangster shootouts and stealth sniper kills. Push your strategic skills to the limit and release your inner combat warrior in a true test of your skills and speed of execution. Use your superb shooting skills to shoot every goal and give you a real war experience. Take aim and play as an agent,47 different kinds of situations are awaiting you in this game.

MANY DIFFERENT CONTRACTS
Are you a fan of FPS shooter games with multiple different missions? Improve your skills for the perfect assassination shot as you uncover secrets and techniques. You can be cold blooded killer, or become a hired hit-man. Work in the shadows.you will protect your city from the threat of terrorists. Earn money as in blood money.

UNIQUE GUNS
Eliminate targets, collect weapons and silenced guns, rifles you name it we got it. The most powerful guns. Use your powerful guns to destroy the enemy. In this game to show your shooting skills, enjoy the thrill of shooting.

Become the ultimate silent killer assassin in this free FPS game.
